about_the_game:
The early access demo is now available!

Please note that nothing in the demo is final, and major changes may occur. The demo is linear which differs from the full game.

We appreciate all form of feedback, even in this stage of the development. Join our discord or post on the Steam community page!

name: Phantom Bound Demo
short_description: Immerse yourself with this spine-chilling Metroidvania-like Ghost Hunting game. Navigate the haunted halls with your electric gadgets, collect upgrades, and show the uninvited ghosts true hospitality!
